function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Controversy over the role of weather conditions in SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Impact":"Misunderstanding of the impact of weather on virus transmission could lead to ineffective mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Further research and collaboration among experts to reach a consensus on the role of weather conditions in virus transmission.","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling, collaboration platforms for experts.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on seasonal trends in temperature and humidity for virus transmission","Impact":"Inaccurate assumptions about virus transmission based on seasonal trends could lead to inadequate preventive measures during certain times of the year.","Mitigation":"Use of multiple data sources and factors to assess virus transmission, not solely relying on temperature and humidity.","Technologies":"Data collection tools, statistical analysis software.","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health and environmental monitoring agencies"},{"Description":"Normalized IPTCC index as a measure of transmission conditions","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the IPTCC index could lead to mistaken conclusions about the risk of virus transmission based on temperature and humidity.","Mitigation":"Clear and comprehensive communication of the interpretation and limitations of the IPTCC index by experts.","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, educational materials.","People":"Public health officials, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
